text: Some thoughts about the ethics of suicideThere are so many pills that I have to take in order to function on a daily basis  Even with those  I still feel like complete garbage on an emotional level  It just helps me to get through each day  but that s all it is   getting through I was thinking about how people can choose not be kept alive on life support  and can have DNRs if they re chronically ill Why don t we have the same for mental illness  I think it might be because mental illnesses are expected to be treatable  which is odd to me because they re some of the most chronic conditions that you can have If I m essentially being kept alive by my meds  why can t I take myself off them and allow myself to deteriorate mentally  Shouldn t that be my right as a human being  I know this might be an unfair comparison  but it s something I ve been thinking about I just want a choice  I didn t choose to feel this badly every day  I want some sense of control and an escape from this constant pain
summary: Some thoughts about the ethics of suicide. People can choose not to be kept alive on life support and can have DNRs if they are chronically ill. Mental illnesses are expected to be treatable. Why can't mental illnesses be treated like chronic conditions?

text: How to access any blocked website on a chromebook under a GoGaurdian Firewall   Most common firewall used by schools  First  search  chrome settings  into your address bar amp x B once you are in your google settings  get to your Authoritative Certificates by going into amp x B Security  gt  Manage Certificates  gt  Authorities amp x B from there  scroll down to  org Amazon amp x B Untrust all four of the certificates by pressing amp x B   gt  edit amp x B from there simply uncheck all of the blue ticks  Hit OK amp x B Then  scroll down until  org Starfield Technologies  Inc amp x B Untrust the Starfield certificates the same as you did Amazon amp x B Once you are done  refresh your page amp x B Open a new tab and try to access a website that would normally be blocked amp x B If you gain access with no problem  you re good to go amp x B If the blocked by administrator screen pops up  you have one more step amp x B Press search   esc   The search key usually has a magnifying glass on it  but on some models its just a circle above shift amp x B A small window should pop up  From there click  Memory Footprint amp x B End all of the processes that have a gray circle with a white triangle inside of it   This is the GoGaurdian symbol amp x B Scroll through and find them all in the list   to end a process simply click on it and press the large button that reads  End Process amp x B Next  close that window and refresh your page amp x B Let me know if this worked for you guys  I will answer any questions to try and help resolve issues
summary: How to access a blocked website on a chromebook under a GoGaurdian Firewall. How to access any blocked website in Google settings and untrust the certificates of Amazon, Starfield Technologies Inc and Memory Footprint to access blocked websites.
cleaned: access block website chrome book guardian firewall access block website google setting entrust certificate amazon star field technologies inc memory footprint access block website

text: What used to scare you in your childhood  and what scared you in the last   years as teenagers  I remember when I was   years old  I think  I used to be scared so easily from the old Lotto ads from my country  they had those small weird creatures with numbers on them  and they were scarying the shit out of me  using their stupid scream  that at the time  it was like a huge jumpscare for me And those ads were even played in the radio  So imagine how many times I had to suffer this stupid scream  over and over and over  not to mention it took me like   years just to get used to it Well  those ads still exist nowadays  but so far they stopped with the scream  so I will forgive them just for that So anyways  about   years ago  I think  from today  I was listening to some Pegboard Nerds songs  when suddenly I came across their collab with an artist named  SNAILS  entitled  Deep In The Night  the artwork was pretty scary  but not too much scary tbh  but it was only the beginning  so after listening to the song  I went to SNAILS  SoundCloud page to see if I am interested in more of his songs  and I had absolutely no fucking clue that I would enter one the scariest place of EDM that I currently know whatsoever  so anyways after scrolling down a bit  I came across his collab with a twin named  Botnek  entitled  Waffle House  and it s artwork  has quickly became no other than my  nd worst nightmare  still to this day  and that nightmare literally gave me a huge trauma for like two weeks I don t even want to say what was in the artwork  if you are curious AF  just search the song on YouTube  but don t say I didn t warned you So anyways  the trauma faded from my brain  but I am still afraid if I will ever see this artwork ever again  because I know that if this will happen  the trauma will most likely be back to me So these are the two traumas that I remember most from both my childhood and my teenagerhood  But I am curious  what were yours  I would like yo know
summary: The old Lotto ads from my country scared me when I was a kid. Pegboard Nerds' collab with SNAILS entitled "Deep In The Night" scared me for two weeks. Waffle House's "Waffle House" is one of the scariest EDM songs I've ever heard.

text: One of my close friends is getting married today and I want to die My friend is getting married today  I wasn t invited to the wedding  and I ve become even more suicidal over the last month since I last posted  Everyone says that it will get better  with patience and time  It s only gotten worse  My friends and family don t even want to hear me talk about it anymore   I tried to plan and have a huge self wedding  but everyone talked me out of it  and I just felt even worse when no one supported me   I m chronically single  and have never experienced anyone loving me the way that I love them  I cannot see myself as being single  and I ve tried to see the positive  and embrace what I have only to end up the next day set off the constant engagements  weddings  baby announcements  I m in my thirties and I go out on dates only to be told that I m a great person but not for them romantically I ve literally prayed for someone to want me the way that I want them since I was seven  I m in therapy  and have been for years  I am on medication  But  over the last five years I ve become more and more despondent about trying to meet someone and marry  I want to have children and take care of my family and I tried to become a foster parent  to adopt and even conceive on my own  Nothing resulted other than many tears My friends and family have heard me talk on and on about how much this bothers me and tell me to be patient and let G d handle it  I m done with being patient and waiting for endless time  I ve tried online dating  approaching guys in bars  getting involved in my community  even trying to meet others on Reddit under my usual Reddit name  No dice  I can t live my life like this  being single and wanting desperately to have what my friends and family have so easily I literally want to die  Seriously end my life and never have to deal with such terrible pain TLDR  I m unhappily single  have been for a quarter of a century and want to die because of it
summary: One of my close friends is getting married today and I want to die because I wasn't invited to the wedding. I've been single for a quarter of a century and want to end my life because of it. I'm in therapy and on medication.
